TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mb’ala, title = Mb’ala, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mb’ala} }

S.FORM: mb'ala Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko mb'ala a niyaro', 142 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 449 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 86% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 385 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 14% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 64 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal77%, Seediq5%, Bunun2%, Amis1%, Cou1%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

mb'ala Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko mb'ala a niyaro', 142 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 449 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 86% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 385 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 14% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 64 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal77%, Seediq5%, Bonon2%, Amis1%, Coo1%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
